desc.en: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.jp: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.thai: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.ko: As it turns out, G.BIBLE only contains a simple maxim: "Love video games." Their sky-high expectations dashed, the Game Development Department, with the help of Aris, begin development on Tales Saga Chronicle 2.
desc.zh_tw: 結果事與願違，<G.Bible>的内容只是「請熱愛遊戲吧」這句單純的句子。這讓遊戲開發部的學生們跌入失落的深淵。在愛麗絲的打氣下，遊戲開發部重新振作起來,著手開發<傳說年代記2>。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 结果事与愿违，<G.Bible>的内容只是「请热爱游戏吧」这句单纯的句子。这让游戏开发部的学生们跌入失落的深渊。在爱丽丝的打气下，游戏开发部重新振作起来,着手开发<传说年代记2>。

desc.en: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.jp: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.thai: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.ko: Everyone opened the file full of joy, but was extremely disappointed by the content. Other than the well known "Love video games", none could be found.
desc.zh_tw: 眾人滿心歡喜打開了檔案，但內容令人大失所望。除了眾所周知的“用心做遊戲”外再無其他。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人满心欢喜打开了文件，但内容令人大失所望。除了众所周知的“用心做游戏”外再无其他。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 众人满心欢喜打开了文件，但内容令人大失所望。除了众所周知的“用心做游戏”外再无其他。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 众人满心欢喜打开了文件，但内容令人大失所望。除了众所周知的“用心做游戏”外再无其他。

desc.en: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.jp: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.thai: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.ko: Everyone was disappointed. Aris expressed her like for TSC and wanted to make TSC2 with others. Yuzu voiced her approval.
desc.zh_tw: 開發部眾人感到十分沮喪。愛麗絲表達了對TSC的喜愛，因此想要與眾人將TSC2製作下去。柚子本人也罕見地表達了支援。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 开发部众人感到十分沮丧。爱丽丝表达了对TSC的喜爱，因此想要与众人将TSC2制作下去。柚子本人也罕见地表达了支持。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.jp: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.thai: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.ko: Yuzu recalled the flooding negative comments in the days after the release of TSC. Her self-confidence was greatly damaged. The door was knocked at then, and initially Yuzu thought it was an angry player, but didn't expect to be Midori and Momoi. Both not only spoke highly of TSC, but would also become the members of the GDD afterwards.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子回想起了TSC發行後幾天漫天的差評言論，自尊心大受損傷。這時門突然被敲想，柚子本以為是憤怒的玩家上門，卻不想迎來了桃井和綠，兩位不僅對TSC評價很高，而且將會成為開發部的成員。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子回想起了TSC发行后几天漫天的差评言论，自尊心大受损伤。这时门突然被敲想，柚子本以为是愤怒的玩家上门，却不想迎来了桃井和绿，两位不仅对TSC评价很高，而且将会成为开发部的成员。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.jp: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.thai: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.ko: Yuzu expressed her thanks for the other three. She said she was hapy to make games with friends. Called by Momoi, everyone began their development that would last for less than a week.
desc.zh_tw: 柚子表達了對其他三人的感謝，表達了自己與夥伴一起做遊戲的喜悅之情。在桃井的號召下，眾人在開始了不到一週的遊戲開發。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子表达了对其他三人的感谢，表达了自己与伙伴一起做游戏的喜悦之情。在桃井的号召下，众人在开始了不到一周的游戏开发。

desc.en: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.jp: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.thai: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.ko: One day, Veritas reaches out to Sensei about the discovery of a suspicious machine. On the way to their club room, Sensei joins up with the Game Development Department to investigate the machine, but none of them are able to get to the bottom of its true nature... As if suddenly drawn by an inexplicable force, Aris touches the machine and activates it.
desc.zh_tw: 有一天，老師從貝里塔斯接獲發現可疑機器的訊息。前往貝里塔斯部室的途中，老師和遊戲開發部相遇，便一起調查機器的來歷。但大家都無法對機器的來歷做出結論…突然間，愛麗絲就像是被吸引般伸出手觸碰機器，機器啟動的同時，愛麗絲也發生了異變。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 有一天，老师从贝里塔斯接获发现可疑机器的消息。前往贝里塔斯部室的途中，老师和游戏开发部相遇，便一起调查机器的来历。但大家都无法对机器的来历做出结论…突然间，爱丽丝就像是被吸引般伸出手触碰机器，机器启动的同时，爱丽丝也发生了异变。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.thai: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.ko: Aris met other Millennium students at school's square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. They were even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在千年廣場遇到了其他千年的學生，大家都很高興見到她。中途愛麗絲還收到了幾個支線任務，被以報酬的名義贈送了點心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在千年广场遇到了其他千年的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途爱丽丝还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.jp: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.thai: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.ko: Aris met the three at Engineering Department. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在校園裡見到了工程部三人，後者表示是出來蒐羅新裝備的。詠葉問愛麗絲光之劍近況如何，愛麗絲則表示在很愛護地使用著。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。歌原问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。咏叶问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在校园里见到了工程部三人，后者表示是出来搜罗新装备的。咏叶问爱丽丝光之剑近况如何，爱丽丝则表示在很爱护地使用着。

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在更多地方見到了更多的人，直到在車站遇見了一個熟悉的身影。

desc.en: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.thai: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.ko: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲叫寧瑠“小不點”讓後者頗為不滿，但還是拽著老師和愛麗絲到了遊戲廳。不出所料，寧瑠不斷輸給了愛麗絲，儘管愛麗絲已經教了她相當一段時間。寧瑠雖然非常惱火愛麗絲評價她的水平不好，但還是請教愛麗絲連招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝叫尼禄“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，尼禄不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。尼禄虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝叫宁瑠“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和爱丽丝到了游戏厅。不出所料，宁瑠不断输给了爱丽丝，尽管爱丽丝已经教了她相当一段时间。宁瑠虽然非常恼火爱丽丝评价她的水平不好，但还是请教爱丽丝连招的操作。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.jp: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.thai: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.ko: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.
desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_cn: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

name.en: A Day at the Game Dev Department
name.jp: A Day at the Game Dev Department
name.thai: A Day at the Game Dev Department
name.ko: A Day at the Game Dev Department
name.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部的平凡日常
name.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部的平凡日常
name.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部的平凡日常
name.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部的平凡日常

desc.en: Sensei pays the Game Development Department a visit for the first time in a while. The members are fielding ideas for the development of their next project, but get distracted watching Aris playing a video game. Aris struggles mid-game upon encountering a cheating player, but gains a dramatic victory thanks to Yuzu's exhilarating performance. However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.
desc.jp: Sensei pays the Game Development Department a visit for the first time in a while. The members are fielding ideas for the development of their next project, but get distracted watching Aris playing a video game. Aris struggles mid-game upon encountering a cheating player, but gains a dramatic victory thanks to Yuzu's exhilarating performance. However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.
desc.thai: Sensei pays the Game Development Department a visit for the first time in a while. The members are fielding ideas for the development of their next project, but get distracted watching Aris playing a video game. Aris struggles mid-game upon encountering a cheating player, but gains a dramatic victory thanks to Yuzu's exhilarating performance. However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.
desc.ko: Sensei pays the Game Development Department a visit for the first time in a while. The members are fielding ideas for the development of their next project, but get distracted watching Aris playing a video game. Aris struggles mid-game upon encountering a cheating player, but gains a dramatic victory thanks to Yuzu's exhilarating performance. However, they fail to make any progress on plans for their next project, and decide to try again tomorrow.
desc.zh_tw: 老師久違地前往遊戲開發部部室。成員們為了研發下一部作品而集思廣益，但不知不覺卻變成了觀看愛麗絲玩遊戲。愛麗絲在遊戲過程中遇見作弊玩家並陷入苦戰，但因為柚子活躍的表現而獲得戲劇般的勝利。但下一部作品的企劃沒有任何進展，生活就和平常沒有兩樣。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师久违地前往游戏开发部部室。成员们为了研发下一部作品而集思广益，但不知不觉却变成了观看爱丽丝玩游戏。爱丽丝在游戏过程中遇见作弊玩家并陷入苦战，但因为柚子活跃的表现而获得戏剧般的胜利。但下一部作品的企划没有任何进展，生活就和平常没有两样。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师久违地前往游戏开发部部室。成员们为了研发下一部作品而集思广益，但不知不觉却变成了观看爱丽丝玩游戏。爱丽丝在游戏过程中遇见作弊玩家并陷入苦战，但因为柚子活跃的表现而获得戏剧般的胜利。但下一部作品的企划没有任何进展，生活就和平常没有两样。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师久违地前往游戏开发部部室。成员们为了研发下一部作品而集思广益，但不知不觉却变成了观看爱丽丝玩游戏。爱丽丝在游戏过程中遇见作弊玩家并陷入苦战，但因为柚子活跃的表现而获得戏剧般的胜利。但下一部作品的企划没有任何进展，生活就和平常没有两样。

desc.en: Sensei was invited to the Game Development Club, but somehow started playing fighting games with Momoi. Momoi wanted to continue playing, but was stopped by his sister Midori; it was at this time when Sensei got the know that he was invited to come up with new ideas for their next games.
desc.jp: Sensei was invited to the Game Development Club, but somehow started playing fighting games with Momoi. Momoi wanted to continue playing, but was stopped by his sister Midori; it was at this time when Sensei got the know that he was invited to come up with new ideas for their next games.
desc.thai: Sensei was invited to the Game Development Club, but somehow started playing fighting games with Momoi. Momoi wanted to continue playing, but was stopped by his sister Midori; it was at this time when Sensei got the know that he was invited to come up with new ideas for their next games.
desc.ko: Sensei was invited to the Game Development Club, but somehow started playing fighting games with Momoi. Momoi wanted to continue playing, but was stopped by his sister Midori; it was at this time when Sensei got the know that he was invited to come up with new ideas for their next games.
desc.zh_tw: 老師受邀來到遊戲開發部，但不知不覺中就和桃井玩起了格鬥遊戲。桃井想繼續和老師玩下去，被妹妹綠攔了下來；這時老師才知道，桃井邀請他來是為了想出下一部遊戲的好點子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师受邀来到游戏开发部，但不知不觉中就和桃井玩起了格斗游戏。桃井想继续和老师玩下去，被妹妹绿拦了下来；这时老师才知道，桃井邀请他来是为了想出下一部游戏的好点子。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师受邀来到游戏开发部，但不知不觉中就和桃井玩起了格斗游戏。桃井想继续和老师玩下去，被妹妹绿拦了下来；这时老师才知道，桃井邀请他来是为了想出下一部游戏的好点子。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师受邀来到游戏开发部，但不知不觉中就和桃井玩起了格斗游戏。桃井想继续和老师玩下去，被妹妹绿拦了下来；这时老师才知道，桃井邀请他来是为了想出下一部游戏的好点子。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.thai: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: Momoi argues that the reason why she was playing, was exactly to attempt to analyze the game in the hope of some inspirations. Momoi purposed an mixture of multiple genres and hoped they could win the Millennium Prize by its uniqueness.
desc.jp: Momoi argues that the reason why she was playing, was exactly to attempt to analyze the game in the hope of some inspirations. Momoi purposed an mixture of multiple genres and hoped they could win the Millennium Prize by its uniqueness.
desc.thai: Momoi argues that the reason why she was playing, was exactly to attempt to analyze the game in the hope of some inspirations. Momoi purposed an mixture of multiple genres and hoped they could win the Millennium Prize by its uniqueness.
desc.ko: Momoi argues that the reason why she was playing, was exactly to attempt to analyze the game in the hope of some inspirations. Momoi purposed an mixture of multiple genres and hoped they could win the Millennium Prize by its uniqueness.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井指出剛剛之所以玩遊戲，正是為了試圖分析並從中獲得一些靈感。桃井的想法是將多種不同風格與型別的遊戲結合到一起，希望能夠藉由此種異類作品斬獲千年大獎。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃井指出刚刚之所以玩游戏，正是为了试图分析并从中获得一些灵感。桃井的想法是将多种不同风格与类型的游戏结合到一起，希望能够藉由此种异类作品斩获千年大奖。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.jp: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.thai: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.ko: Himari maintained her own conclusion, and a disagreement took place. Rio tried to trap Himari with her AMAS, but Himari hacked the room and her AMAS and escaped successfully.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵固守著自己的結論，與莉央產生了嚴重分歧。莉央試圖用AMAS將陽葵困住，但陽葵輕鬆駭入了房間和AMAS的系統，逃出了房間。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将日鞠困住，但日鞠轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将阳葵困住，但阳葵轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵固守着自己的结论，与莉央产生了严重分歧。莉央试图用AMAS将阳葵困住，但阳葵轻松骇入了房间和AMAS的系统，逃出了房间。

ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.thai:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.ko:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
desc.zh_tw:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.jp: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.thai: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.ko: Himari came to the corridor outside the room, talking to herself and making fun on how stubborn Rio was. But right at this moment Himari was firmly controlled by an unknown person - the fifth C&C member who existed only in rumors before.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵來到房間外的走廊，自言自語笑話著莉央的固執。然而這時陽葵卻被一位不明人士——傳說中的第五位C&C成員——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 日鞠来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时日鞠却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 阳葵来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时阳葵却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 阳葵来到房间外的走廊，自言自语笑话着莉央的固执。然而这时阳葵却被一位不明人士——传说中的第五位C&C成员——所牢牢控制住。

desc.ko: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
